column1: Silence is golden. Unless you have kids. Then silence is suspicious.
Licked a dark smear off my finger and then thought, “Phew, it’s chocolate!”
I don’t want to sleep like a baby. I want to sleep like my husband.
When your “mom voice” is so loud even the neighbors brush their teeth and get dressed.
I slept in until 7:30 and now have a clogged bathroom sink, all the candy is gone, and the playroom is a disaster. Worth it.
Yes, please get a new cup every time you need a drink of water – said no mom, ever.
Sitting along in the bathroom with the door locked and eating Nutella. How’s your day going?
Before, I only allowed high-end shoes in my closet. Now all I own are Crocs and Target flip-flops.
Toddler is sweeping the kitchen, her new favorite thing, while I watch Sesame Street and laugh. This is a strange role reversal.
“Can he have this?” With first baby: “Is it organic and homemade?” After second baby: “He can have anything except narcotics and alcohol.”
Every time I go shopping I go straight to the baby section.
Spit-up is my new favorite accessory; no outfit is complete without it.
They say to test out baby names, say them over and over again. Bull. What they really should suggest is to be called Mom over and over and over again, and see if you still choose that.
I feel personally victimized by my own daughter. I just want her to stop throwing crackers at me.
Started making myself breakfast, and ended up making everybody except myself breakfast.
I hope people believe my toddler has a slight English accent because we are so cultured, not because she was raised by Peppa Pig.
My expectations + reality = comedy. Or crying myself to sleep.
It’s official: I’m in love… with my Roomba.
I hate when I’m waiting for mom to cook dinner and then I remember that I am the mom and I have to cook dinner.
Whoever wrote the song “I’m easy like Sunday morning” did not have kids.
When my kids act up in public, I like to yell “wait till I tell your mom!” and pretend they’re not mine.
“You are going to miss this someday”… I tell myself as I step on Legos all the way to the bathroom.
You known you’re a good mom when you sacrifice your vibrator batteries for your kid’s toy.
You know you’re a mom when your idea of world peace would be everything having a drive-thru.
Parenting is one obstacle after another. But, like, literally, because no one ever puts anything away.
Booty call: a shout from the bathroom letting you know it’s time to wipe someone’s butt.
“I will drink you under the table”… I whisper to my coffee as we hide from the children.
Tucked my kids in bed and said “I’ll see you in the morning!” Then we laughed and laughed and saw each other 16 more times before sunrise.
Boys: less drama than girls, but harder to keep alive.
When I fart and wait for people to smell it.
Do I look like someone who cares what God thinks?
I’m not fat, I am fluffy.
Just once I’d love to see a liars pants catch on fire.
My dentist told me I need a crown. I was like I know, right?
During the day I don’t believe in ghosts. At night I’m a little more open minded.
Math. Mental Abuse To Humans.
Breaking news! I don’t care.
If I was a bird, I know who I would shit on.
My mom said “follow your dreams”. So I went back to bed.
The face you get when you ask your kids to do something.
We all have that one friend who needs to learn how to whisper.
Respect your parents. They passed school without google…
Behind every crazy women… Is a man who made her that way…
You couldn’t handle me even if I came with instructions.
Age is just a number… yeah, and jail is just a room.
Someone just called me normal… I have never been so insulted in my entire life.
I need to go on medication so I can slap stupid people and blame it on the side effects.
If you like someone, set them free. If they come back, it means nobody liked them. Set them free again.
I love those people who can make me laugh during those moments when I feel like I can’t even smile.
I’m not short… I’m a people McNugget.
I am under no obligation to make sense to you.
I hate it when people ask me what I am doing tomorrow. I don’t even know what I’m doing right now!
Sometimes my greatest accomplishment is just keeping my mouth shut…
I wish my wallet came with free refills.
Have you ever looked at someone and automatically felt annoyed?
I do it because I can, I can because I want to, I want to because you said I couldn’t.
At night I can’t sleep, and in the morning I can’t wake up!
I hate the part of the morning where I have to get out of my bed and participate in real life.
Arguing with a woman is like getting arrested. Everything you say can and will be used against you.
If a clown farts, does it smell funny?
We are all mature until someone brings out some bubble wrap.
Paychecks and weekends have a lot in common… they are short and don’t last long enough.
The older I get the more I come to realize that I just don’t care what the hell anyone thinks!
Be a fruit loop in a world full of cheerios.
“Username or password incorrect.”… well at least tell me which one it is.
If you want to change the world, do it when you’re single. Once you’re married you can’t even change the TV channel.
Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
Apparently I have an attitude. Who knew!
It’s Monday. Let’s do this.
If you want me to control my temper, you need to control your stupidity!
Don’t like me? Cool, I don’t wake up every day to impress you…
I’m only a morning person on December 25th…
I’m not sure if my body can handle much more of this “getting out of bed” nonsense.
I am one step away from being rich, all I need now is money.
It takes skill to trip over flat surfaces.
Our phones fall, we panic. Our friends fall, we laugh.
Are you free tonight? No, I’m expensive.
Walmart: “Hey, let’s buy 30 cash registers and only keep 2 open.”
It’s before not b4. I speak English not bingo.
I just ran 5 miles and what a workout! I didn’t think that ice cream truck would ever stop.
Since there’s only one of me, does that make me endangered or limited edition?
Coffee: the most important meal of the day.
Work, really? Again? Didn’t I just do that yesterday?
Best friends are like siblings from different parents.
I have unlimited texting and only text about three people.
A balanced diet is chocolate in both hands.
So much to do. No desire to do it!
Of course I talk to myself. Sometimes I need expert advice.
I swear my last words are going to be, “I got this.”
Never go to bed angry… stay awake and plot revenge!
I’m going to retire and live off my savings. What I’ll do the second day, I have no idea.
I’m not fat, God gave me airbags cause I’m precious.
At my age I’ve seen it all, done it all, and heard it all. I just can’t remember any of it!
When I see a clown fish I automatically think “OMG its Nemo”!
Don’t bother putting your hand over my mouth to shut me up. I will lick you.
Who says nothing is impossible? I’ve been doing nothing for years.
If you bring me coffee without having to ask, then I love you.
I’m ready for Friday, who’s with me?
Sometimes I panic and think there’s a crazy person in my house… then I realize it’s just me!
Here is your nose. I found it in my business.
If stress burned calories, I’d be a super model!
Don’t judge me. I was born to be awesome, not perfect.
Don’t be afraid of a few extra pounds. Fat people are harder to kidnap.
Like if you have ever pushed a door that said pull.
Lead me not into temptation… oh hell. Just follow me, I know a shortcut.
I’m not really your friend until I start insulting you on a daily basis.
If I ever had to run for my life, I am pretty sure I would die!
Waking up before 7 AM should be illegal.
We are not old, we are recycled teenagers!
I’m in shape, unfortunately that shape is a circle.
I have lost my mind and I am making no effort to look for it.
My phone went to jail… now he’s a cell phone!
Dear dreams, stop ending when I get to the best part!
I always say “morning” instead of “good morning” because if it were a good morning I’d still be in bed asleep.
Exercise? I thought you said “extra fries”.
If I actually spoke my mind, I’d be in deep shit!
When I feel down and someone tells me to “suck it up”. I get the urge to break their legs with a baseball bat and then say “walk it off”.
Sometimes, I forget how to spell a word so I change the whole sentence to avoid using it.
I wasn’t made for winter. I want my flip-flops.
Live, laugh, love. If that doesn’t work, load, aim, and fire!
The youngest sibling is usually the most good looking and the smartest.
You know how you can smack something to get it to work? I wish I could do that with people.
Where is far far away and how do I get there?
I never make the same mistake twice. I make it 5 or 6 times, just to be sure.
Dear haters, I couldn’t help but notice that “awesome” ends with “me” and “ugly” starts with “u”.
Life is not a box of chocolates. It’s more like a jar of jalapenos: what you do today can burn your ass tomorrow!
I swear, if my memory was any worse, I could plan my own surprise party!
School for 12 years, college for 4 years.. then work until you die. Great.
I hate that awkward moment when you think you do a silent fart and it comes out like a machine gun.
Home: where I can look ugly and enjoy it.
That annoying moment when you finally get comfortable in bed, but then bam, you have to pee.
One more glass of wine won’t hurt!
My doctor told me to start killing people. Well not in those exact words, he said I should reduce the stress in my life. Same thing.
I think stupid people were put on this planet to test my anger management skills.
I have a disease called awesome. You won’t understand it because you don’t have it.
You say I’m dirty minded… but how did you understand what I meant?
They say that the body is made up of 90 percent water so… I’m not fat, I’m just water logged!
If I got kidnapped they’d probably give me back after 20 minutes because I’m annoying.
Math. The only place where people buy 64 watermelons and no one wonders why.
I don’t want a prince on a white horse. I want a bottle of wine!
Sitting alone and enjoying your own company is better than being surrounded by fake people.
Life is too short to be serious all the time. So if you can’t laugh at yourself, call me and I will laugh at you.
So if a redhead goes crazy, is it called ginger snaps?
If someone calls you “ugly” have a good comeback and say “excuse me, I am not a mirror”!
Every day I arrive at work with good intentions and a great attitude… then idiots happen.
You’re so full of shit the toilet’s jealous.
My get up and go got up and went.
My “get up and go” looked around, said “seriously?” and sat right back down.
I did a push-up today. Well, actually I fell down, but I had to use my arms to get back up, so… close enough.
I need chocolate.
As I have grown older, I’ve learned that pleasing everyone is impossible, but pissing everyone off is a piece of cake.
I will slap you so hard even google won’t be able to find you.
My teacher pointed his ruler at me and said: “at the end of this ruler is an idiot!”. I got detention after asking which end.
Smart cars, smart TVs, smart phones… when will they start making smart people?
My boss told me to have a good day… so I went home!
Heck yes I’m short, God only lets things grow until they’re perfect. Some of us didn’t take as long as others.
I don’t always tolerate stupid people, but when I do, I’m probably at work.
True friends don’t judge each other. They judge other people… together.
I don’t trip. I do random gravity checks.
If you fart loudly in public, just yell “jet power!”.
A woman can only run as fast as her boobs will allow her.
Human logic: cut the trees, make paper with them, and write “save the trees”.
The only reason I’m fat is because a tiny body couldn’t store all this personality.
Today I’m doing nothing because I started doing it yesterday and I wasn’t finished. I’m no quitter!
What do you get when you mix PMS with a GPS? A moody bitch who will find you.
When I said I cleaned my room. I just meant I made a path from the doorway to my bed.
When you spell a word so wrong that even auto correct is like “I’ve not nothing man!”.
I have been on a diet for two weeks. So far I’ve only lost 14 days.
Be happy in front of people who don’t like you, it kills them.
What did one butt cheek say to the other? Together we can stop this shit.
Why do we put round pizza in a square box, then eat it in triangles?
you known you’re getting old when you feel bad in the morning without having had any fun the night before!
I just stepped on a corn flake. Now I am officially a cereal killer.
If I was a plastic surgeon, I would 100 percent put a squeaky toy in every breast implant.
You can’t always control who walks into your life… but you can control which window you throw them out of!
Dear karma, I have a list of people you missed.
I think my iPhone is broken. I pressed the home button and I’m still at work.
You are not drunk until you have to grab onto grass to keep from falling off the Earth!
Hey auto correct, quit tampering with my curse words, you mother forklift!
Do you mean to tell me a stress ball isn’t for throwing at people who stress you out?
Singing in the shower is all fun and games until you get shampoo in your mouth, then it just becomes a soap opera.
I tried to cook dinner with wine tonight. It didn’t go so well, after 5 glasses I forgot why I was even in the kitchen!
I’m on a light diet: I eat by daylight, I eat by moonlight, and sometimes I eat by refrigerator light.
I hate two-faced people. It makes it harder for me to decide which side to slap first.
I hate it when I go to a restaurant and they ask “would you like a table?”. No, I want the floor…
Share this if you know someone who is alive today simply because you don’t want to go to prison.
I’m responsible for what I say, not how you interpret it.
If I got paid by the amount of stupid people I deal with at work instead of by the hour, I could retire by next week!
Men look at a woman’s behind and go “wow, what an ass!” Women look at a man’s face and think the same thing.
Men have PMS too. Piss and moan syndrome!
I hate it when people text me: “call me.” I’m gonna start calling people and when they answer. I’m gonna say: “text me”, and hang up.
I’m a little smart ass, fat and stout. Here is my finger, here is my mouth. When I get all worked up I will shout, piss me off and I’ll knock you out!
I hate how after an argument I think of all the clever shit I should have said.
When I was younger, 20 dollars felt like 100 dollars, now 20 dollars feels like 1 dollar.
When you’re stressed, you eat ice cream, cake, chocolate and sweets. Why? Because stressed spelled backwards is desserts.
I look at people sometimes and think: for real? That’s the sperm that won?
I’m a girl. I don’t smoke, drink or party every weekend. I don’t sleep around or start drama to get attention. Yes, we still do exist.
Apparently, when you treat people the same way they treat you, they get offended!
I’ve finally lost my mind. If found, don’t bother to return it. It wasn’t working properly anyway.
Girls who say “a lot of guys are after me” should keep in mind that low prices always attract many customers.
When I call my parents and they don’t answer it’s no big deal, but when they call me and I don’t answer, its like world war 3.
When I told you I was a normal person, I may have exaggerated slightly.
I wasn’t mad. Then you asked me 10 times if I was mad… Now I’m mad!
I think its funny that people who treat ;you like shit get offended when you finally do the same to them.
Always remember these two words, they will open every door in your life: push and pull.
Sometimes those who don’t socialize much aren’t actually anti-social, they just have no tolerance for drama and fake people.
Just once, I would like to read a medication label that says: warning, may cause permanent weight loss, remove wrinkles, and increase energy!
I hate it when I forget to press send and I’m sitting there like an idiot waiting for a reply.
I tried to be normal once. Worst two minutes of my life…
Talking to your best friend is sometimes all the therapy you need.
Does anyone else have a plastic bag full of plastic bags at their house, or is it just me?
They say we learn from our mistakes. That’s why I’m making as many as possible. I’ll be a genius soon.
When killing them with kindness doesn’t work, try a baseball bat. Results may vary!
My wallet is like an onion. When I open it, it makes me cry!
I’m just going to put an “out of order” sticker on my forehead and call it a day!
Eight year olds today have Facebook, Twitter, an iPhone and an iPod. When I was eight, I had a coloring book, Crayons, and an imagination.
Can’t you see it? You’re one in a minion.
Why do they call it “beauty sleep” when you wake up looking like a troll!
A good mood is like a balloon… one little prick is all it takes to ruin it!
Cleaning is just putting stuff in less obvious places.
I made a huge to do list for today. I just can’t figure out who’s going to do it!
I hate it when I’m trying to eat a salad and it accidentally falls in the trash and I then I have to eat a pizza instead.
Have you ever noticed that a woman’s “I’ll be ready in five minutes” and a man’s “I’ll be home in five minutes” are exactly the same?
Don’t worry about getting older. You still get to do stupid things, only slower…
Although it gets me into trouble I usually always speak my mind. Because it hurts too much to bite my tongue!
I may be a sweet girl, but if you make me mad, I have a pocket full of crazy waiting to come out!
A cop pulled me over and said “papers.” I said “scissors, I win” and drove off.
Nope, can’t go to Hell. Satan still has that restraining order against me!
If I died I want my friends to keep updating my status to freak people out.
Keep rolling your eyes… maybe one day you’ll find a brain back there!
I can’t dance to save my life, but the moment I stop in dog poop I can moon walk better than Michael Jackson.
I don’t hold grudges. I just remember things for a very long time!
I love my six pack so much, I protect it with a layer of fat.
Dear math, please grow up and solve your own problems, I’m tired of solving them for you.
If money doesn’t grow on trees, then why do banks have branches?
It’s been a rough week, but on a positive note, I didn’t need any bail money, and I didn’t have to hide any bodies!
I’m not special, I’m just limited edition.
Young enough to know I can, old enough to know I shouldn’t, stupid enough to do it anyway.
Never piss off a woman, they remember stuff that hasn’t even happened yet.
I’m so bored of being bored. Because being bored is really boring.
My mind says I’m in my twenties… my body says yeah, you wish!
The problem with some people is that they exist.
I hate it when I have to be nice to someone I really want to throw a brick at.
Hmm, that’s a bit too harsh. Let me put “lol” at the end of it.
I might look like I’m doing nothing, but in my head I’m quite busy.
If he only wants your breasts, legs, and thighs, send him to KFC!
The best feeling is waking up in the middle of the night and realizing you still have hours left to sleep.
If one door opens and another closes, your house is haunted!
I have a condition that prevents me from dieting. It’s called “being freaking hungry!”
Heat makes things expand… so I don’t have a weight problem, I’m just hot!
Sometimes you will never know that true value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
I would like to think I would die a heroic death, but it’s more likely I’ll trip over my dog and choke on a spoon full of frosting.
Auto correct can go straight to he’ll.
Do not argue with an idiot. He will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience.
I may be old, but I am not dead yet. Inside of me is a kid screaming, “who locked me up in this wrinkled old thing!”
The 5 second rule for food dropped on the ground does not work if you have a 2 second dog.
Never let your friends feel lonely! Disturb them at all times!
Can you die from constipation? I’m a little worried with how full of shit some people are.
Do you ever just want to move somewhere new where no one knows who you are and start all over again.
I’m never wrong. I’m just different levels of right.
I was just wondering… does anyone else get road rage from pushing a cart through Walmart… or is it just me?
I tried to send you something sexy, but the mailman told me to get out of the mailbox.
Does anyone else put things in a safe place and then forget where that safe place is?
That awkward moment when a zombie is looking for brains and it walks right past you…
I’m the type of person that will burst out laughing in dead silence over something that happened days ago…
Common sense is a flower that does not grow in everyone’s garden!
Wouldn’t it be so great if we could put ourselves in the dryer for 10 minutes and come out wrinkle free and three sizes smaller?
I love ordering things online because when they arrive, it’s like a present from me to me.
Life is much easier when you just don’t care what anyone thinks!
My bed wasn’t feeling well this morning so I stayed home to take care of it.
Every guy thinks that every girls’ dream is to find the perfect guy… Please, every girls’ dream is to eat without getting fat!
There’s only one things that keeps me from breaking you in half, I don’t want two of you around!
I’m about 3 pounds away from Google maps listing me as a roundabout.
I don’t have bad angles, I’m just ugly.
Banana!
Folgers got it wrong. The best part of waking up is going back to bed after you pee!
I’m bored. Let’s go to Walmart and superglue coins to the floor and count how many people try and pick them up.
Don’t piss me off. I will stop taking my pills, and nobody wants that, do they?
Dear Mr. Spider, unless you pay rent… you can’t live in my house.
I’m done with Winter. Next season please!
I don’t want to be a grown up anymore. It’s not nearly as much fun as it was supposed to be.
Have you ever listened to someone for a while and wondered “Who ties your shoelaces for you?”
Happiness is having friends who are idiots.
Note to self: just because it pops into my head does not mean it should come out of my mouth.
I do not understand how anyone can be addicted to drugs in a world with chocolate, ice cream, lasagna, and internet.
I wanna be like a caterpillar: eat a lot, sleep loads, and then wake up beautiful.
When I bang my toe against something, it’s like I pressed a button that plays all the curse words I know.
What’s on my mind? Ooh, that’s a dangerous place to go!
Ain’t no Harley, but it goes!
I look back on my life and I’m extremely impressed that I’m still alive…
I hate my moods, they never ask permission before they change.
I hope we’re friends until we die. Then I hope we stay ghost friends and walk through walls and scare the shit out of people.
Don’t make me mad and then tell me to calm down. That’s like shooting someone and then wondering why they’re bleeding.
Sometimes even I am afraid of the things my mind comes up with.
Don’t text me while I’m in the middle of texting you. Now I have to change my whole text…
I’m going to be very busy in the afterlife. The list of people I plan to haunt gets bigger everyday.
I would swim the ocean for you… lol, just kidding, there are sharks in there.
We are all mature until someone brings out some bubble wrap…
Oh, so you wanna argue? Bring it. I got my caps lock on.
Grow up? Never!
Me? Mature? I still laugh when the ketchup bottle farts!
I should be given an award for keeping my mouth shut when there is so much that needs said.
I do not have a screw loose, it fell out!
Not sure if I should sleep, or drink more coffee…
Sarcasm: the ability to insult idiots without them realizing it.
Some people are just like trees. They take forever to grow up!
1 percent battery left and you run like a ninja to get your charger.
When life gives you lemons, throw it back and ask for chocolate!
A good friend calls you in jail. A great friend bails you out of jail. Your best friend sits next to you and says “wasn’t that fun?”
Raise your hand if you have a bad habit of laughing at a serious moment.
Karma is like a rubber band. You can only stretch it so far before it comes back and smacks you in the face!
Note to self: it is illegal to stab people for being stupid.
Does anyone else get scared when a text reads “Can I ask you a question?”
I always mean what I say… I don’t always mean to say it out loud!
Attention! I am out of order until further notice. My “stupid people” filter needs cleaning and my “give a damn” batteries have run out.
That mini heart attack when you miss a step on the stairs.
I didn’t fall. The floor was lonely, so I gave it a hug.
Three out of four voices in my head want to sleep. The other wants to know if penguins have knees!
Don’t grow up, its a trap!
I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to “push all your buttons.” I was just looking for mute!
My kids call it “yelling” when I raise my voice… but I call it “motivational speaking” for the selective hearing.
If you see me eating a salad in a restaurant, I’ve been kidnapped and I’m trying to signal to you.
Welcome: today’s specials are lack of sleep, up too early, and low on patience… thank you, come again.
Do you ever just wake up and go “nope” and roll over and go back to sleep?
Who else needs another day added to the weekend?
You know you’ve grown up when a nap no longer feels like a punishment, but a reward.
I will never apologize for being me… you should apologize for asking me to be anything else.
Sometimes the thoughts in my head get bored and stroll out through my mouth. This is never a good thing.
Of course I speak my mind. My head would explode if I kept all this bitching to myself!
A police officer came to my house and asked me where I was between 5 and 6. He seemed irritated when I answered “kindergarten!”
Do you ever write a really long message and about halfway through you’re like “you know what, they don’t even care” and delete it.
Some of the best moments in life are the ones you can’t tell anyone about.
I may be a bad influence but… damn I’m fun!
I have decided that I no longer want to be an adult… if anyone needs me, I will be in my blanket fort coloring.
Best friends don’t let you do stupid things… alone!
If your friends don’t make fun of you they are not really your friends.
My doctor asked if any members of my family suffered from insanity. I replied, no, we all seem to enjoy it!
I told my boss three companies were after me and I needed to a raise to stay at my present job. He asked which three were interested. I said “the gas, electric, and cable!”
Some people make me want to roll my eyes and say “whatever.”
Cinderella is proof that a new pair of shoes can change your life.
I hate those moods where you have no reason to be sad or annoyed, but you just are.
I had to remain silent.. but I didn’t have the ability!
Once in a while someone amazing comes along, and here I am!
Sometimes you just have to close your eyes, count to ten, take a deep breath, and remind yourself that you wouldn’t look good in prison stripes!
When you truly don’t care what anyone thinks of you, you have reached a dangerously awesome level of freedom!
I was chasing my dreams, but tripped over reality and busted my head on the truth!
I’m not short. I’m concentrated awesome.
Smile! Spoil the day for some grouch.
I don’t have bad handwriting. I have my own font.
By the power vested in me, I now pronounce you blocked and deleted!
It takes skill to trip over flat surfaces!
I am temporarily out of order! Please try again later!
I’m not crazy. I prefer the term mentally hilarious…
The trick is to not let people know how really weird you are until it’s too late for them to back out…
Weekend… you get back here and let me love you!
A woman’s anger is like a check engine light. There is no way to figure out why it came on. Just ignore it and hope it goes away.
If you have one friend who understands you on your level of crazy… one friend is all you will ever need!
I’m not short. My height is just cute!
Please copy and paste this to your status if you know someone, or have been affected by someone who needs a smack upside the head!
Just because it is a bad idea doesn’t mean it is not a gonna be a hell of a lot of fun!
Sometimes my greatest accomplishment… is just keeping my mouth shut!
Some people have ah ha moments. Not me. I have ah shit moments.
I am a good enough person to for give you, but not stupid enough to trust you again!
Damn you mirror! That’s not what I look like in my head!
The only exercise some people get is running their mouth, jumping to conclusions, and pushing their luck!
If you don't want a sarcastic answer
column2: then don't ask a stupid question.
